name: Potionworks! (Early Access)
description:
Want a (hopefully) fun potion making game? Well you've came to the right place! This game is in early access so there could be glitches, and uncompleted things in the game. Press any button to skip the intro cutscene.

Oh yeah, and to any Luna Nova Academy lovers out there, the "✨" are a reference to Shining Chariot.

Credits: Once Upon A Time - Toby Fox, UNDERTALE Original Game Soundtrack
